00060 #ifdef __GNUC__                          // AVRGCC does not support point to PGM space
00061         extern PGM_VOID_P pbuffer;
00062 #else
00063         extern U8   code *pbuffer;
00064 #endif
00065         
00066 extern U8   data_to_transfer;
00067 extern U8   initial_data_to_transfer;
00068 extern S_line_coding   line_coding;

00081 Bool usb_user_read_request(U8 type, U8 request)
00082 {
00083    U16 wValue;
00084 
00085    LSB(wValue) = Usb_read_byte();
00086    MSB(wValue) = Usb_read_byte();
00087 
00088    if( USB_SETUP_SET_CLASS_INTER == type )
00089    {
00090       switch( request )
00091       {
00092          case SETUP_CDC_SET_LINE_CODING:
00093          cdc_set_line_coding();
00094          return TRUE;
00095          break;
00096    
00097          case SETUP_CDC_SET_CONTROL_LINE_STATE:
00098          cdc_set_control_line_state(); // according cdc spec 1.1 chapter 6.2.14
00099          return TRUE;
00100          break;
00101    
00102          case SETUP_CDC_SEND_BREAK:
00103          cdc_send_break(wValue);             // wValue contains break lenght
00104          return TRUE;
00105          break;
00106       }
00107    }
00108    if( USB_SETUP_GET_CLASS_INTER == type )
00109    {
00110       switch( request )
00111       {
00112          case SETUP_CDC_GET_LINE_CODING:
00113          cdc_get_line_coding();
00114          return TRUE;
00115          break;
00116       }
00117    }
00118    return FALSE;  // No supported request
00119 }

00129 Bool usb_user_get_descriptor(U8 type, U8 string)
00130 { 
00131      switch(type)
00132    {
00133       case DESCRIPTOR_STRING:
00134       switch (string)
00135        {
00136               case LANG_ID:
00137               data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_language_id);
00138               pbuffer = &(usb_user_language_id.bLength);
00139               return TRUE;
00140               break;
00141               case MAN_INDEX:
00142               data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_manufacturer_string_descriptor);
00143               pbuffer = &(usb_user_manufacturer_string_descriptor.bLength);
00144               return TRUE;
00145               break;
00146               case PROD_INDEX:
00147               data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_product_string_descriptor);
00148               pbuffer = &(usb_user_product_string_descriptor.bLength);
00149               return TRUE;
00150               break;
00151               case SN_INDEX:
00152                 
00153 #if (USE_UNIQUE_SIGNATURE==ENABLE)
00154               f_get_serial_string=TRUE;
00155               data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_serial_number)+(UNIQUE_SIGNATURE_LENGTH*4);
00156               initial_data_to_transfer=data_to_transfer;
00157               pbuffer = &(usb_user_serial_number.bLength);
00158 #else
00159               data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_serial_number);
00160               pbuffer = &(usb_user_serial_number.bLength);
00161 #endif
00162               return TRUE;
00163               break;
00164               default:
00165               return FALSE;
00166        }
00167       default:
00168       return FALSE;
00169    }
00170 }

00177 void usb_user_endpoint_init(U8 conf_nb)
00178 {
00179   usb_configure_endpoint(INT_EP,      \
00180                          TYPE_INTERRUPT,     \
00181                          DIRECTION_IN,  \
00182                          SIZE_32,       \
00183                          ONE_BANK,     \
00184                          NYET_ENABLED);
00185 
00186   usb_configure_endpoint(TX_EP,      \
00187                          TYPE_BULK,  \
00188                          DIRECTION_OUT,  \
00189                          SIZE_32,     \
00190                          ONE_BANK,     \
00191                          NYET_ENABLED);
00192 
00193   usb_configure_endpoint(RX_EP,      \
00194                          TYPE_BULK,     \
00195                          DIRECTION_IN,  \
00196                          SIZE_32,       \
00197                          ONE_BANK,     \
00198                          NYET_ENABLED);
00199 
00200   Usb_reset_endpoint(INT_EP);
00201   Usb_reset_endpoint(TX_EP);
00202   Usb_reset_endpoint(RX_EP);
00203 
00204 
00205 }
00206 
00215 void cdc_get_line_coding(void)
00216 {
00217      Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00218      Usb_write_byte(LSB0(line_coding.dwDTERate));
00219      Usb_write_byte(LSB1(line_coding.dwDTERate));
00220      Usb_write_byte(LSB2(line_coding.dwDTERate));
00221      Usb_write_byte(LSB3(line_coding.dwDTERate));
00222      Usb_write_byte(line_coding.bCharFormat);
00223      Usb_write_byte(line_coding.bParityType);
00224      Usb_write_byte(line_coding.bDataBits);
00225 
00226      Usb_send_control_in();
00227      while(!(Is_usb_read_control_enabled()));
00228      //Usb_clear_tx_complete();
00229 
00230    while(!Is_usb_receive_out());
00231    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00232 }
00233 
00234 
00243 void cdc_set_line_coding (void)
00244 {
00245    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00246    while (!(Is_usb_receive_out()));
00247    LSB0(line_coding.dwDTERate) = Usb_read_byte();
00248    LSB1(line_coding.dwDTERate) = Usb_read_byte();
00249    LSB2(line_coding.dwDTERate) = Usb_read_byte();
00250    LSB3(line_coding.dwDTERate) = Usb_read_byte();
00251    line_coding.bCharFormat = Usb_read_byte();
00252    line_coding.bParityType = Usb_read_byte();
00253    line_coding.bDataBits = Usb_read_byte();
00254      Usb_ack_receive_out();
00255 
00256      Usb_send_control_in();                // send a ZLP for STATUS phase
00257      while(!(Is_usb_read_control_enabled()));
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00265 void cdc_set_control_line_state (void)
00266 {
00267    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00268     Usb_send_control_in();
00269    while(!(Is_usb_read_control_enabled()));
00270 }
00271 
00272 
00279 void cdc_send_break(U16 break_duration)
00280 {
00281    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00282    Usb_send_control_in();
00283    while(!(Is_usb_read_control_enabled()));
00284 }
